name: PKPayment
desc: Represents the result of authorizing a payment request and contains payment information, encrypted in the payment token.

items.name: var billingContact: PKContact?
items.desc: The user-selected billing address for this transaction.

items.name: var shippingContact: PKContact?
items.desc: The user-selected shipping address for this transaction.

items.name: var shippingMethod: PKShippingMethod?
items.desc: The user-selected shipping method for this transaction.

items.name: class PKContact
items.desc: An object that encapsulates contact information needed for billing and shipping.

items.name: class PKShippingMethod
items.desc: An object that defines a shipping method for delivering physical goods.
